name: RhythmGun (liLaur)
description:
• These cubes are mad at you. Protect yourself from them. They spawn on music. 
    • Be careful, the yellow ones can't be destroyed and can kill you with ease.
  • Music;
  • Easy and Hard difficulty.
  • Join Discord for updates and to report bugs: https://discord.gg/nXuGRrBrbe
  • You can download a demo to try out the game.
